text:
[Verse]
Days fade fast
Colors burst bright
Sky turns gold
Endless light

[Verse 2]
Shadows grow tall
Birds take flight
Stars come out
Night's first sight

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams
Golden beams
Peaceful streams
Sunset dreams

[Verse 3]
Whispers soft
Cool breeze flows
Quiet dusk
Hearts aglow

[Verse 4]
Day's last kiss
Darkness near
Moonlight's glow
No more fear

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams
Golden beams
Peaceful streams
Sunset dreams
title: Sunset Dreams
